restaurant.name: Giovanni's Italia Fine Dining
restaurant.summary: Giovanni’s Italia Fine Dining is a completely restored Victorian stone house and offers a warm and elegant atmosphere with gracious service.

restaurant.name: Baker Street TexMex Grill
restaurant.summary: Baker Street TexMex Grill is my favorite restaurant in Ottawa. The family who owns it are warm and welcoming, and they have a knack for remembering their customers. The burritos are exceptional, with customizable options that include guacamole. The addition of cactus to the veggie mix sets this place apart from other Mexican restaurants in the area.

restaurant.name: Sushi Ottawa
restaurant.summary: Sushi Ottawa is renowned for its top-quality sushi offerings. The restaurant boasts a diverse menu and attentive service, making it a favorite among sushi enthusiasts.

restaurant.name: Le Bistro Français
restaurant.summary: Le Bistro Français offers an authentic French dining experience with a cozy ambiance and delicious cuisine. Known for their exquisite wine selection and classic dishes like Coq au Vin.

restaurant.name: La Cantina Italiana
restaurant.summary: La Cantina Italiana serves traditional Italian dishes in a lively atmosphere. From wood-fired pizzas to homemade pasta, every dish is prepared with fresh ingredients and passion.

restaurant.name: Spice Garden Indian Cuisine
restaurant.summary: Spice Garden Indian Cuisine offers a delightful journey through the flavors of India. From aromatic curries to tandoori specialties, each dish is crafted to perfection.

restaurant.name: The Steakhouse Grill
restaurant.summary: The Steakhouse Grill is renowned for its prime cuts of beef cooked to perfection. With an extensive wine list and impeccable service, it's the ideal destination for steak enthusiasts.

restaurant.name: Thai Orchid Garden
restaurant.summary: Thai Orchid Garden offers authentic Thai cuisine in a tranquil setting. From spicy curries to flavorful stir-fries, each dish is prepared with fresh herbs and traditional spices.

restaurant.name: Sabor Latino
restaurant.summary: Sabor Latino offers a vibrant taste of Latin America with its flavorful dishes and festive atmosphere. From savory empanadas to tender grilled meats, each bite is a celebration of culture and flavor.

restaurant.name: Seoul Garden BBQ
restaurant.summary: Seoul Garden BBQ offers an interactive dining experience with its tabletop grills and flavorful Korean barbecue dishes. From marinated meats to kimchi pancakes, each dish is a delight for the senses.

restaurant.name: Mediterranean Delights
restaurant.summary: Mediterranean Delights offers a taste of the Mediterranean with its fresh salads, grilled meats, and flavorful dips. From hummus to falafel, each dish is a culinary journey through the region's diverse flavors.

restaurant.name: Pho King Vietnamese Restaurant
restaurant.summary: Pho King Vietnamese Restaurant serves authentic Vietnamese cuisine with a focus on fresh ingredients and bold flavors. From steaming bowls of pho to crispy spring rolls, each dish is a culinary delight.

restaurant.name: Coastal Seafood Shack
restaurant.summary: Coastal Seafood Shack offers fresh seafood dishes inspired by coastal cuisines from around the world. From succulent lobster rolls to crispy fish tacos, each bite is a taste of the ocean's bounty.
